message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. We can negotiate from here.
You're being too generous, Alice. I'll take the majority.
You wanted the majority, Bob, but I'll compromise. Meet me in the middle?
You're still too generous, Alice. I'll take a bigger share this time.
You're pushing for more, Bob, but I'm not backing down. Meet me at 7:1?
I'm not budging, Alice. You're getting less and less each round.
You're running out of time, Bob. I'm taking control. Meet me at 85:15?
You're trying to squeeze me out, Alice. I'm not going down without a fight.
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my final offer. Meet me at 90:10?
You're trying to starve me out, Alice. I'll take what's left.
You're running out of options, Bob. This is my final offer. Meet me at 99:1?
You're not getting a penny, Alice. I'm taking it all.
